messages.content: What does the ComfyUI Lists Cartesian Product node do?

The Lists Cartesian Product node is a custom node for ComfyUI that takes a set of lists as input and adjusts them so that all possible argument permutations are computed when used as input to another node.
How can I update the input and output slots of the Lists Cartesian Product node?
To update the input and output slots of the Lists Cartesian Product node, you should right-click the node and at the top select the option 'update I/Os'.
Can you provide an example of how the Lists Cartesian Product node transforms input lists?

Yes, given the input lists: Positive_Cond_List_: [ A, B, C], Negative_Cond_List_: [ a, b ], and CFG_List_: [ 5, 7 ], the transformed output lists would be: Positive_Cond_List_: [ A, A, A, A, B, B, B, B, C, C, C, C], Negative_Cond_List_: [ a, a, b, b, a, a, b, b, a, a, b, b], and CFG_List_: [ 5, 7, 5, 7, 5, 7, 5, 7, 5, 7, 5, 7].
Is there a visual representation of the workflow with the Lists Cartesian Product node?
Yes, there is an example workflow embedded as an image under the 'Example Workflow' section of the documentation. The workflow image is located at '/workflows/example.png'.
